page.title: 13 Recreation
page.content: The{children}of Eastham occupy their time by going to Torr Park to play on the swings and slides. At night and also at weekends they can go to the local Youth Club.There is table tennis,a pool table,dancing, T.V.room and a bar where they sell drinks such as coke and sodas. For adults, there are 5 public houses in the area they may go to. {Eastham Ferry}is a large area next to the River Mersey where you can walk on a nature trail through the woods, have a drink at one of the two pubs or play on the adventure playground. Over the{River Mersey}you can see the Festival Gardens which is a smaller version of the{International {Garden Festival}which was staged in Liverpool in 1984.You can also see aircraft at Liverpool Airport and the Runcorn Suspension Bridge.
